response.overview: In a quiet Goan village, whispers of a mysterious protector echo through generations - a spirit known as the Rakondar. Some say he helps the lost, while some say he punishes those who mock him. When a skeptical young man challenges the legend, the village's oldest tales begin to feel dangerously real. Some stories are told to scare children. This one might just be true.
response.title: XIM: The Boundary
